title: "Refik Anadol's Artwork 'Quantum Memories' Integrates AI and Machine Learning"
excerpt: "Based in LA, Turkish digital artist Refik Anadol brings his signature style of AI and media-enriched works to explore the relationship between technology and art. His futuristic piece Quantum Memories draws upon a dataset of more than two hundred million nature-related images from the internet processed with quantum computing software,"
